verses.verse: This <S%G5124><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> also <S%G1161><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> perilous <S%G5467><s%> times <S%G2540><s%> shall come <S%G1764><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> men <S%G444><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> lovers of their own selves <S%G5367><s%>, covetous <S%G5366><s%>, boasters <S%G213><s%>, proud <S%G5244><s%>, blasphemers <S%G989><s%>, disobedient <S%G545><s%> to parents <S%G1118><s%>, unthankful <S%G884><s%>, unholy <S%G462><s%>,

Without natural affection <S%G794><s%>, trucebreakers <S%G786><s%>, false accusers <S%G1228><s%>, incontinent <S%G193><s%>, fierce <S%G434><s%>, despisers of those that are good <S%G865><s%>, false: or, one who foments strife
Traitors <S%G4273><s%>, heady <S%G4312><s%>, highminded <S%G5187><s%>, lovers of pleasures <S%G5369><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> lovers of God <S%G5377><s%>;

Having <S%G2192><s%> a form <S%G3446><s%> of godliness <S%G2150><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> denying <S%G720><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%>: from <S%G2532><s%> such <S%G5128><s%> turn away <S%G665><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> this sort <S%G5130><s%> are they <S%G1526><s%> which creep <S%G1744><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> houses <S%G3614><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> lead captive <S%G162><s%> silly women <S%G1133><s%> laden <S%G4987><s%> with sins <S%G266><s%>, led away <S%G71><s%> with divers <S%G4164><s%> lusts <S%G1939><s%>,
Ever <S%G3842><s%> learning <S%G3129><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> never <S%G3368><s%> able <S%G1410><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of the truth <S%G225><s%>.

<S%G3739><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G5158><s%> Jannes <S%G2389><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Jambres <S%G2387><s%> withstood <S%G436><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%>, so <S%G3779><s%> do <S%G436><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> resist <S%G436><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%>: men <S%G444><s%> of corrupt <S%G2704><s%> minds <S%G3563><s%>, reprobate <S%G96><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%>. reprobate: or, of no judgment reprobate: or, of no judgment

But <S%G235><s%> they shall proceed <S%G4298><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> further <S%G1909><s%> <S%G4119><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> their <S%G846><s%> folly <S%G454><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> manifest <S%G1552><s%> unto all <S%G3956><s%> men, as <S%G5613><s%> theirs <S%G1565><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G1096><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> hast fully known <S%G3877><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> doctrine <S%G1319><s%>, manner of life <S%G72><s%>, purpose <S%G4286><s%>, faith <S%G4102><s%>, longsuffering <S%G3115><s%>, charity <S%G26><s%>, patience <S%G5281><s%>, fully: or, been a diligent follower of

Persecutions <S%G1375><s%>, afflictions <S%G3804><s%>, which <S%G3634><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%>, at <S%G1722><s%> Iconium <S%G2430><s%>, at <S%G1722><s%> Lystra <S%G3082><s%>; what <S%G3634><s%> persecutions <S%G1375><s%> I endured <S%G5297><s%>: but <S%G2532><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> them all <S%G3956><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> delivered <S%G4506><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>.

Yea <S%G1161><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that will <S%G2309><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> godly <S%G2153><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> shall suffer persecution <S%G1377><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> men <S%G444><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> seducers <S%G1114><s%> shall wax <S%G4298><s%> worse and worse <S%G1909><s%> <S%G5501><s%>, deceiving <S%G4105><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> being deceived <S%G4105><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> continue <S%G3306><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> thou hast learned <S%G3129><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hast been assured of <S%G4104><s%>, knowing <S%G1492><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> whom <S%G5101><s%> thou hast learned <S%G3129><s%> them;

And <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> from <S%G575><s%> a child <S%G1025><s%> thou hast known <S%G1492><s%> the holy <S%G2413><s%> scriptures <S%G1121><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> are able <S%G1410><s%> to make <S%G4679><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> wise <S%G4679><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

All <S%G3956><s%> scripture <S%G1124><s%> is given by inspiration of God <S%G2315><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> is profitable <S%G5624><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> doctrine <S%G1319><s%>, for <S%G4314><s%> reproof <S%G1650><s%>, for <S%G4314><s%> correction <S%G1882><s%>, for <S%G4314><s%> instruction <S%G3809><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>:

That <S%G2443><s%> the man <S%G444><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> may be <S%G5600><s%> perfect <S%G739><s%>, throughly furnished <S%G1822><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>. throughly: or, perfected
